title: Short-Term Language Proficiency Improvement Course Through Innovative Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience with Online Learning
context.additional_context: Customized corporate language proficiency enhancement program focusing on real-time interaction and project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners participate in three or more virtual group discussions using online collaboration tools to enhance their ability to present opinions.
Learners improve the accuracy of language expression by 30% through a real-time feedback system.
Learners demonstrate the ability to use situational professional language through project-based task performance.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
